title: Bodyguard
desc:
Post 435
- When played, choose a player to protect. Next time someone forces them to draw a card, it's negated and the attacker draws 4 cards instead. You draw 1 card when activated.
- You can protect yourself. If you do so, it won't negate the cards you were supposed to gain and the attacker only draws 2 cards. You still draw 1 card when this is activated.
